s0150: Initially, Huan Gong fled time, passed Tan, Tan no rites, so attacked it.
s0151: Fifth year, attacked Lu, Lu will troops defeated.
s0152: Lu Zhuang Gong requested offer Sui yi to pacify, Huan Gong permitted, with Lu met at Ke allied.
s0153: Lu about ally, Cao Mei with dagger kidnapped Huan Gong on altar, said: 'Return Lu's invaded land!'
s0155: Afterward Cao Mei removed dagger, north faced took minister position.
s0156: Huan Gong afterward regretted, wished not give Lu land kill Cao Mei.
s0157: Guan Zhong said: 'Kidnap permitted then betray trust kill him, moreover one small pleasure, abandon trust at feudal lords, lose world's support, cannot.'
s0158: Therefore then gave Cao Mei three times defeated lost land to Lu.
s0159: Feudal lords heard it, all trusted Qi wished attach.
s0160: Seventh year, feudal lords assembled Huan Gong at Zhen, Huan Gong then began hegemon.
s0161: Fourteenth year, Chen Li Gong son Wan, number Jing Zhong, came flee Qi.
s0162: Qi Huan Gong wished make him minister, declined;
s0165: Twenty-third year, Shan Rong attacked Yan, Yan urgently told Qi.
s0166: Qi Huan Gong saved Yan, then attacked Shan Rong, reached Gu Zhu returned.
s0167: Yan Zhuang Gong then sent Huan Gong enter Yan border.
s0168: Huan Gong said: 'Not Son of Heaven, feudal lords mutually send not exit border, I cannot without rites to Yan.'
s0169: Therefore divided ditch cut Yan lord arrived place gave Yan, ordered Yan lord again repair Zhao Gong government, pay tribute to Zhou, like Cheng Kang time.
s0170: Feudal lords heard it, all followed Qi.
s0171: Twenty-seventh year, Lu Min Gong mother called Ai Jiang, Huan Gong younger sister.
s0172: Ai Jiang lewd with Lu gong zi Qing Fu, Qing Fu assassinated Min Gong, Ai Jiang wished establish Qing Fu, Lu people moreover established Xi Gong.
s0173: Huan Gong summoned Ai Jiang, killed her.
s0174: Twenty-eighth year, Wei Wen Gong had Di disorder, urgently told Qi.
s0175: Qi led feudal lords walled Chu Qiu established Wei lord.
s0176: Twenty-ninth year, Huan Gong with wife Cai Ji played in boat.
s0177: Cai Ji accustomed water, rocked duke, duke feared, stopped her, not stopped, went out boat, angered, returned Cai Ji, not cut off.
s0178: Cai also angered, married off his daughter.
s0179: Huan Gong heard angered, raised troops went attack.
s0180: Thirtieth year spring, Qi Huan Gong led feudal lords attacked Cai, Cai collapsed.
s0182: Chu Cheng Wang raised troops asked: 'Why cross my land?'
s0183: Guan Zhong answered: 'Formerly Zhao Kang Gong commanded our previous lord Tai Gong: 'Five marquises nine earls, if truly attack them, to flank assist Zhou chamber.'
s0184: Granted our previous lord shoes, east to sea, west to Yellow River, south to Mu Ling, north to Wu Di.
s0185: Chu tribute wrapped thatch not enter, Wang sacrifice not complete, so came demand.
s0186: Zhao Wang south campaign not return, so came ask.'
s0187: Chu Wang said: 'Tribute not enter, have it, I guilty, dare not not supply!
s0188: Zhao Wang out not return, lord ask water shore.'
s0189: Qi troops advanced stationed at Xing.
s0190: Summer, Chu Wang sent Qu Wan led troops defended Qi, Qi troops retreated stationed Zhao Ling.
s0191: Huan Gong showed off Qu Wan with his multitudes.
s0192: Qu Wan said: 'Lord with way then possible;
s0193: if not, then Chu Fang Cheng as city, Yangtze Han as moat, lord how able advance?'
s0194: Then allied with Qu Wan left.
s0195: Passed Chen, Chen Yuan Tao Tu cheated Qi, ordered go eastern direction, discovered.
s0197: This year, Jin killed crown prince Shen Sheng.
s0198: Thirty-fifth year summer, assembled feudal lords at Kui Qiu.
